sense.gloss: sounding stone, qing, ancient Chinese chime shaped like a chevron (inverted 'v'), orig. of stone, today often metal, in Japan primarily used at Buddhist temples
inverted copper or iron bell shaped like a bowl (sounded when reciting sutras)
